title: (Fri Early Bird) Fun Fact Friday + Easy Trivia + Mailbag: Listener Received Two Pairs Of Shoes Even Though They Only Paid For One
itunes:title: (Fri Early Bird) Fun Fact Friday + Easy Trivia + Mailbag: Listener Received Two Pairs Of Shoes Even Though They Only Paid For One
description:
Start your Friday off with some fun facts we give you in Fun Fact Friday! We all share an interesting fact you may have never known before! Then, we play a few rounds of Easy Trivia. Find out who the new winner is! Mailbag: A listener received two pairs of shoes in the mail but she only ordered one. Does that mean she should tell the company or just keep both shoes? We weigh in on the options.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
